name: Red and Yellow Cherry Tomato Confit
recipeIngredient: 3 sprigs fresh rosemary, leaves removed and stem discarded
Coarse sea salt or kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spread tomatoes and garlic out on a baking sheet. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, crushed red pepper, a large pinch of salt and several grinds of pepper. Bake until tomatoes are wrinkled and fragrant, about 45 minutes, shaking pan once or twice. Transfer tomato pan to a rack to cool. Discard garlic. Use confit in salads, or serve over dishes like pasta, fresh ricotta cheese or polenta, or on grilled meats, fish or fowl.
